data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 3, Marcos De Oliveira signals a Orlando throw-in in Montreal's half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal.
Orlando's Mauricio Pereyra breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 7, Montreal have a goal kick.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Montreal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
In the minute 12, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Orlando.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
In the minute 16, In Orlando Orlando's Tesho Akindele is caught offside.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Orlando at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In Orlando Orlando drive forward through Chris Mueller. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
In the minute 23, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Orlando a goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Montreal throw-in in Orlando's half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
Free kick Orlando.
Goal kick for Montreal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Orlando close to the penalty box.
Orlando have a dangerous throw-in.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 30, In Orlando, Joao Moutinho of Orlando is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Clement Diop (Montreal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
In the minute 31, Marcos De Oliveira awards Orlando a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 40, Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Montreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 43, In Orlando, Orlando push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Montreal needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Montreal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 45, Marcos De Oliveira blows against Orlando's Tesho Akindele for offside.
Free kick Orlando.
At ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Marcos De Oliveira blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Orlando.
In the minute 46, Marcos De Oliveira signals a Orlando throw-in in Montreal's half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal.
Thierry Henry is making the team's first substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Jukka Raitala replacing Orji Okwonkwo.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
In the minute 47, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Montreal.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Orlando.
In the minute 57, Jhegson Mendez (Orlando) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Orlando's Joao Moutinho gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 59, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Orlando take a 1-0 lead thanks to Tesho Akindele.
In the minute 62, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal just outside Orlando's area.
Joao Moutinho (Orlando) has received a yellow card from Marcos De Oliveira.
Free kick in a good position for Montreal!
Montreal make their second substitution with Anthony Jackson-Hamel replacing Bojan Krkic.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a throw-in for Montreal, close to Orlando's area.
In the minute 68, Montreal push forward at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex and Anthony Jackson-Hamel gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orlando defence.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
The match at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex has been interrupted briefly for a check on Antonio Carlos, who is down injured.
In the minute 71, Orlando’s Antonio Carlos is on his feet again at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Montreal throw-in in Orlando's half.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Orlando at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Lassi Lappalainen is on a sub for Rod Fanni for Montreal.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Can Montreal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
In the minute 75, Daryl Dike is replacing Tesho Akindele for Orlando at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Andres Perea is on a sub for Mauricio Pereyra for Orlando.
In Orlando Orlando attack through Jhegson Mendez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 76, Marcos De Oliveira awards Montreal a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal attack but Romell Quioto's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Orlando have a goal kick.
Orlando's Pedro Gallese has been booked in Orlando.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Orlando.
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a third substitution, with Rodrigo Schlegel replacing Chris Mueller.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Montreal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Oscar Pareja is making the team's fourth substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Joey Dezart replacing Jhegson Mendez.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 86, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a fifth substitution, with Kyle Smith replacing Ruan.
Montreal make their fourth substitution with Maximiliano Urruti replacing Samuel Piette.
In the minute 88, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Orlando.
Can Orlando capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
Throw-in Orlando.
Throw-in for Orlando close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
Daryl Dike (Orlando) has received a first yellow card.
